list.name: Days
list.rawQuery:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)) + 1 AS time_sec,
	'Day 0' AS text,
	'Day 0' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 29 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 1' AS text,
	'Day 1' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 28 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 2' AS text,
	'Day 2' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 27 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 3' AS text,
	'Day 3' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 26 DAY)) AS time_sec,

UNION

SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 19 DAY)) AS time_sec,

SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 18 DAY)) AS time_sec,

UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 17 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 13' AS text,
	'Day 13' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 16 DAY)) AS time_sec,

	'Day 14' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 15 DAY)) AS time_sec,

	'Day 15' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 14 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 16' AS text,
	'Day 16' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 13 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 17' AS text,
	'Day 17' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 12 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 18' AS text,
	'Day 18' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 11 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 19' AS text,
	'Day 19' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 10 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 20' AS text,
	'Day 20' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 9 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 21' AS text,
	'Day 21' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 8 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 22' AS text,

UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 23' AS text,
	'Day 23' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 6 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 24' AS text,
	'Day 24' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 5 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 25' AS text,
	'Day 25' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 4 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 26' AS text,
	'Day 26' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 3 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 27' AS text,
	'Day 27' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 2 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 28' AS text,
	'Day 28' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)) AS time_sec,
	'Day 29' AS text,
	'Day 29' AS tags
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) AS time_sec,
	'Day 30' AS text,
	'Day 30' AS tags

targets.rawSql:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)) + UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TagValue.Timestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.StartTimestamp) AS time_sec,
	TagValue.Value AS value,
	CONCAT(CAST(EventFrame.EventFrameId AS CHAR(10)), '_', AttributeTemplate.Name) AS metric 
FROM ElementAttribute
	INNER JOIN Element ON ElementAttribute.ElementId = Element.ElementId
	INNER JOIN EventFrame ON Element.ElementId = EventFrame.ElementId
	INNER JOIN AttributeTemplate ON ElementAttribute.AttributeTemplateId = AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId
	INNER JOIN Tag ON ElementAttribute.TagId = Tag.TagId
	INNER JOIN TagValue ON Tag.TagId = TagValue.TagId
WHERE (EventFrame.EventFrameId IN ($eventFrames)) AND 
	(AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId IN ($attributeTemplates)) AND
	IF (EventFrame.EndTimestamp IS NULL, (TagValue.Timestamp >= EventFrame.StartTimestamp), (TagValue.Timestamp >= EventFrame.StartTimestamp) AND 
	(TagValue.Timestamp <= EventFrame.EndTimestamp))

list.label: Enterprise:
list.name: enterprise
list.query: SELECT Enterprise.EnterpriseId AS __value, Enterprise.Name AS __text FROM Enterprise

list.label: Site:
list.name: site
list.query: SELECT Site.SiteId AS __value, Site.Name AS __text FROM Site WHERE Site.EnterpriseId = $enterprise

list.label: Element Template:
list.name: elementTemplate
list.query: SELECT ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId AS __value, ElementTemplate.Name AS __text FROM ElementTemplate WHERE ElementTemplate.SiteId = $site

list.label: Event Frame Template:
list.name: eventFrameTemplate
list.query: SELECT EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId AS __value, EventFrameTemplate.Name AS __text FROM EventFrameTemplate WHERE EventFrameTemplate.ElementTemplateId = $elementTemplate

list.label: Event Frames:
list.name: eventFrames
list.query: SELECT EventFrame.EventFrameId AS __value, IF(EventFrame.Name IS NOT NULL AND EventFrame.Name <> '', EventFrame.Name, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(EventFrame.StartTimestamp, '%m/%d/%y %H:%i'), ' - ', IF(EventFrame.EndTimestamp IS NULL, '', DATE_FORMAT(EventFrame.EndTimestamp, '%m/%d/%y %H:%i')))) AS __text FROM EventFrame WHERE EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId = $eventFrameTemplate AND $__timeFilter(EventFrame.StartTimestamp) ORDER BY StartTimestamp DESC

list.label: Attributes:
list.name: attributeTemplates
list.query: SELECT AttributeTemplate.AttributeTemplateId AS __value, AttributeTemplate.Name AS __text FROM AttributeTemplate WHERE AttributeTemplate.ElementTemplateId = $elementTemplate
